original_text: You, Lord, will make your nation stronger. You will cause your people to be very happy. They will be happy because you are with them. They will be like people who are happy at the time of harvest. They will be happy like soldiers who have won a battle, and who share their enemy's valuable things among themselves.
korean_text: 주께서 이 나라를 창성하게 하시며 그 즐거움을 더하게 하셨으므로 추수하는 즐거움과 탈취물을 나눌 때의 즐거움 같이 그들이 주 앞에서 즐거워하오니

sentences.original_text: You, Lord, will make your nation stronger
sentences.korean_translation: 주님, 당신은 당신의 나라를 더 강하게 만드실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: You will cause your people to be very happy
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 백성을 매우 기쁘게 만드실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will be happy because you are with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신이 그들과 함께하기 때문에 기쁠 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will be like people who are happy at the time of harvest
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 추수 때 기뻐하는 사람들과 같을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will be happy like soldiers who have won a battle
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 전투에서 승리한 군인들처럼 기쁠 것입니다

sentences.original_text: who share their enemy's valuable things among themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 적의 귀한 것들을 서로 나누어 가집니다
